con:call.name: CreateClaim Request
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:sws="http://stamps.com/xml/namespace/2021/01/swsim/SwsimV111">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <sws:CreateClaim>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Authenticator>?</sws:Authenticator>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Credentials>\r <sws:IntegrationID>?</sws:IntegrationID>\r <sws:Username>?</sws:Username>\r <sws:Password>?</sws:Password>\r </sws:Credentials>\r <sws:StampsTxID>?</sws:StampsTxID>\r <sws:ClaimType>?</sws:ClaimType>\r <sws:ItemDescription>?</sws:ItemDescription>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:recipientPhoneNumber>?</sws:recipientPhoneNumber>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:RecipientEmail>?</sws:RecipientEmail>\r <sws:RequestedClaimAmount>?</sws:RequestedClaimAmount>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:ProofOfValueURL>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <sws:string>?</sws:string>\r </sws:ProofOfValueURL>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:OrderValue>0.0</sws:OrderValue>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:EndUserRefund>0.0</sws:EndUserRefund>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:ProofOfDamageURL>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <sws:string>?</sws:string>\r </sws:ProofOfDamageURL>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:claimContactName>?</sws:claimContactName>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:claimContactEmail>?</sws:claimContactEmail>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:claimContactPhoneNumber>?</sws:claimContactPhoneNumber>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:claimAddress>?</sws:claimAddress>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:claimCity>?</sws:claimCity>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:claimState>?</sws:claimState>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:claimCountry>?</sws:claimCountry>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:claimZIP>?</sws:claimZIP>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:claimPaymentPreference>AccountBalance</sws:claimPaymentPreference>\r </sws:CreateClaim>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
